plugins.name: frameToGroup
plugins.description:
frameToGroup converts frames into organised groups while retaining essential visual properties.


✨ Key Features

✅ Effortless Conversion – Convert frames into neatly structured groups while keeping fills, strokes, and effects intact.

✅ Nested Frame Handling – Automatically processes nested frames for a well-organised layer structure.

✅ Style Preservation – Retains local styles and effects using asynchronous processing.

✅ User-Friendly UI – Simple, intuitive interface with one-click conversion.

✅ Continuous Workflow – Keep the plugin open for multiple conversions without interruptions.


✨ How to Use

  1. Select the frames you wish to convert in your Figma document.
  2. Click "Convert Frames to Groups" in the plugin UI.
plugins.tagline: Convert Frames to Groups While Retaining Styles

plugins.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
plugins.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.

accepted.name: Alexandra (Sasha) Hunter
accepted.description: I do graphic and product design.

plugins.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles

plugins.name: 数据生成图表可视化工具（专业版） Data Vision Chart Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin enables users to create beautiful and interactive charts directly within Figma. Whether you need a bar, line, donut, or pie chart, the plugin offers real-time updates and customizable styles for seamless data visualization.


Function Description

  1. Create different chart types: Line, Bar, Donut, and Pie charts.
  2. Customize chart styles with predefined themes or use custom colors.
  3. Easily add, edit, and remove data rows with an intuitive interface.
  4. Export generated charts directly as Figma frames for further design use.
  5. Support for multiple languages, including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, and Korean.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select the chart type you want to create.
  2. Input the required data and choose a predefined color scheme or customize it.
  3. Set the chart dimensions (width and height) as per your design needs.
  4. Click "Generate Chart" to create the chart frame in Figma.
  5. Customize the chart further by adjusting colors and data points as needed.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports dynamic data updates and real-time chart previews.
  2. Ensure that all necessary data rows are filled to avoid incomplete chart generation.
  3. You can switch between chart types to explore different data visualizations.


介绍

此插件让用户可以直接在 Figma 中创建漂亮且交互式的图表。无论是柱状图、折线图、环形图还是饼图，插件都提供实时更新和自定义样式，助力轻松进行数据可视化。


功能说明

  1. 支持生成不同类型的图表：折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。
  2. 提供多种预设主题配色，或使用自定义颜色。
  3. 直观界面，轻松添加、编辑和删除数据行。
  4. 将生成的图表直接导出为 Figma 的框架，用于后续设计。
  5. 支持多种语言，包括英语、简体中文、繁体中文、印地语、日语和韩语。


使用方法

  1. 选择您需要创建的图表类型。
  2. 输入所需数据，选择预设配色或自定义颜色。
  3. 根据设计需要设置图表尺寸（宽度和高度）。
  4. 点击“生成图表”按钮，即可在 Figma 中创建图表框架。
  5. 您可以根据需要进一步调整图表的颜色和数据点。


注意事项

  1. 插件支持动态数据更新和实时图表预览。
  2. 确保所有必要的数据行已填写完整，以避免生成不完整的图表。
  3. 您可以在不同的图表类型之间切换，探索不同的数据可视化效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Generate stunning charts for data visualization with ease

plugins.name: 打印工具 Figma Print Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

Figma Print Pro is a specialized plugin that helps you create print-ready documents directly in Figma. Easily set up standard or custom page sizes, add bleed areas and crop marks, export high-quality PDFs in multiple color formats, and ensure professional results with built-in DPI checks.


Function Description

  1. Custom & Preset Dimensions: Choose from popular print sizes (A4, A3, B5) or enter exact dimensions.
  2. Bleed & Crop Marks: Add bleed lines and crop marks to prepare for professional trimming.
  3. Multi-page Documents: Generate multi-page print layouts all within a single Figma file.
  4. Color Management: Export PDFs in RGB, CMYK, or grayscale for precise color control.
  5. Adjustable Image Quality: Downsample images and set compression levels to optimize file size.
  6. DPI Checks: Analyze frames to confirm whether resolution meets professional print standards.


Usage

  1. Set Up a Document: In the plugin panel, pick a preset size (A4, A3, B5) or enter your custom width and height.
  2. Adjust Settings: Define bleed margins, enable crop marks, and specify the page count.
  3. Preview: The plugin generates a quick visual preview of each page.
  4. Export to PDF: Choose a color format (RGB, CMYK, or grayscale), select image quality settings, then export.
  5. Check DPI: Run the DPI check tool to ensure images and frames meet print-quality standards.


Tips

  1. Recommended DPI: For most print jobs, 300 DPI is standard. Ensure your images and frames meet or exceed this resolution.
  2. Color Consistency: When using CMYK, note that colors may differ slightly from on-screen previews.
  3. Bleed Setup: If your printer requires a bleed, confirm the exact measurement specifications with your print provider.
  4. Downsampling: Keep an eye on image clarity if you significantly reduce the DPI to minimize file size.


介绍

Figma Print Pro 是一款专为在 Figma 中直接创建印刷文档的插件。它支持自定义或常见的标准纸张尺寸，允许添加出血线和裁切线，支持导出多种颜色格式的高质量 PDF，并可进行 DPI 检查，帮助您轻松获得专业的印刷效果。


功能说明

  1. 自定义与预设尺寸：可使用常见的印刷尺寸（A4、A3、B5）或自行输入宽高。
  2. 出血线与裁切线：可配置出血线并添加裁切线，满足专业印刷需求。
  3. 多页文档：在单个 Figma 文件中快速生成多页的打印版面。
  4. 颜色管理：支持 RGB、CMYK 以及灰度输出，便于精确控制印刷颜色。
  5. 可调节图像质量：支持图像降采样并可设置压缩比，实现更小文件体积。
  6. DPI 检查：可检查 Frame 分辨率，判断是否符合专业印刷要求。


使用方法

  1. 文档设置：在插件面板中，选择 A4、A3、B5 等预设尺寸，或手动输入自定义宽高。
  2. 参数调整：设定出血值、是否添加裁切线，以及需要的页面数量。
  3. 预览页面：插件会生成每页的预览，方便快速查看效果。
  4. 导出 PDF：选择颜色模式（RGB、CMYK 或灰度），根据需求调整图像质量后即可导出。
  5. 检查 DPI：使用 DPI 检查功能，确保图像或 Frame 的分辨率达到了可印刷的标准。


注意事项

  1. 建议 DPI：一般印刷要求 300 DPI，确保图像及画框分辨率符合或高于该标准。
  2. 颜色差异：使用 CMYK 模式时，实际印刷颜色可能与屏幕上显示的略有偏差。
  3. 出血线设置：如印刷厂有特殊要求，请提前确认所需的出血值。
  4. 图像降采样：若大幅降低分辨率以减小文件体积，需注意图像清晰度的影响。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Streamline print creation & DPI checks in Figma

plugins.name: 画板json导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin is designed to help users export detailed JSON data of selected nodes, including auto layout information, Frame nesting relationships, text properties, and more. With this plugin, users can easily retrieve structured data from design elements, facilitating data analysis, secondary development, or documentation.


功能

  1. Export complete JSON data of selected nodes, including properties like type, name, size, position, fills, strokes, and more.
  2. Support exporting text content, font name, font size, and other properties of text nodes.
  3. Support nested export of nodes such as Frame, Group, Component, and Instance, preserving the full hierarchical structure.
  4. Complete export of auto layout information, including layout mode, primary and secondary axis alignment, padding, and spacing.
  5. Safely serialized JSON data export ensures compatibility and completeness.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select one or more nodes from which you want to export data.
  2. Click the export button in the plugin, and the plugin will automatically extract all relevant information from the selected nodes and generate JSON data.
  3. The exported JSON data will be displayed in the plugin interface, allowing users to copy or download it for further use.


Notes

  1. This plugin currently supports exporting properties of common node types such as Frame.
  2. Ensure that the selected node types are supported by the plugin; otherwise, related data might not be exportable.
  3. If errors occur during the export process, check whether the nodes contain excessive nesting or complex properties. Simplify the structure if needed and try again.


简介

本插件旨在帮助用户导出选定节点的详细 JSON 数据，包括节点的自动布局信息、Frame 嵌套关系、文本属性等。通过此插件，用户可以轻松地获取设计元素的结构化数据，便于进行数据分析、二次开发或文档记录。


功能

  1. 导出选定节点的完整 JSON 数据，包括节点的类型、名称、尺寸、位置、填充、边框等属性。
  2. 支持导出文本节点的文本内容、字体名称、字号等属性。
  3. 支持 Frame、Group、Component、Instance 等节点类型的嵌套导出，保留完整的层次结构。
  4. 自动布局信息的完整导出，包括布局模式、主次轴对齐方式、填充和间距等。
  5. 导出的 JSON 数据经过安全序列化，确保兼容性和完整性。


使用说明

  1. 选中一个或多个需要导出数据的节点。
  2. 在插件中点击导出按钮，插件将自动提取选定节点的所有相关信息并生成 JSON 数据。
  3. 导出的 JSON 数据将会显示在插件界面中，用户可以复制或下载该数据用于其他用途。


注意事项

  1. 本插件目前只支持导出 Frame节点类型的属性。
  2. 请确保选定的节点类型受插件支持，否则可能无法导出相关数据。

109711.name: 画板json导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro
109711.description:
Introduction

This plugin is designed to help users export detailed JSON data of selected nodes, including auto layout information, Frame nesting relationships, text properties, and more. With this plugin, users can easily retrieve structured data from design elements, facilitating data analysis, secondary development, or documentation.


功能

  1. Export complete JSON data of selected nodes, including properties like type, name, size, position, fills, strokes, and more.
  2. Support exporting text content, font name, font size, and other properties of text nodes.
  3. Support nested export of nodes such as Frame, Group, Component, and Instance, preserving the full hierarchical structure.
  4. Complete export of auto layout information, including layout mode, primary and secondary axis alignment, padding, and spacing.
  5. Safely serialized JSON data export ensures compatibility and completeness.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select one or more nodes from which you want to export data.
  2. Click the export button in the plugin, and the plugin will automatically extract all relevant information from the selected nodes and generate JSON data.
  3. The exported JSON data will be displayed in the plugin interface, allowing users to copy or download it for further use.


Notes

  1. This plugin currently supports exporting properties of common node types such as Frame.
  2. Ensure that the selected node types are supported by the plugin; otherwise, related data might not be exportable.
  3. If errors occur during the export process, check whether the nodes contain excessive nesting or complex properties. Simplify the structure if needed and try again.


简介

本插件旨在帮助用户导出选定节点的详细 JSON 数据，包括节点的自动布局信息、Frame 嵌套关系、文本属性等。通过此插件，用户可以轻松地获取设计元素的结构化数据，便于进行数据分析、二次开发或文档记录。


功能

  1. 导出选定节点的完整 JSON 数据，包括节点的类型、名称、尺寸、位置、填充、边框等属性。
  2. 支持导出文本节点的文本内容、字体名称、字号等属性。
  3. 支持 Frame、Group、Component、Instance 等节点类型的嵌套导出，保留完整的层次结构。
  4. 自动布局信息的完整导出，包括布局模式、主次轴对齐方式、填充和间距等。
  5. 导出的 JSON 数据经过安全序列化，确保兼容性和完整性。


使用说明

  1. 选中一个或多个需要导出数据的节点。
  2. 在插件中点击导出按钮，插件将自动提取选定节点的所有相关信息并生成 JSON 数据。
  3. 导出的 JSON 数据将会显示在插件界面中，用户可以复制或下载该数据用于其他用途。


注意事项

  1. 本插件目前只支持导出 Frame节点类型的属性。
  2. 请确保选定的节点类型受插件支持，否则可能无法导出相关数据。
  3. 如果导出过程中出现错误，请检查节点是否包含过多层次的嵌套或复杂的属性，建议简化结构后再试。

This plugin helps you batch change icon stroke sizes so that you can maintain consistency and don't have to do it manually. Helps in maintaining a clean design system.

plugins.description:
Slide Auto-Numbering


This plugin automatically numbers your Figma Slides. Wherever a TEXT layer named “page number” exists, it will be overwritten with the correct slide index (1, 2, 3, …).


How to use:

• Ensure each slide has a TEXT layer named “page number.”

• Run the plugin (Plugins → Development → Slide Auto-Numbering → Run).

• The plugin will number the slides linearly in the order provided by Figma Slides.

plugins.name: Remote Variable Replacer
plugins.description:
Sometimes Figma variables aren’t coming from inside the house. While this plugin has a likely very tiny amount of potential users, if I can help anybody save any time trying to locate and replace variables that are orphans or “remote”, then this has been worth it.


For whatever reason, variables in Figma can be attached to other libraries, older files, archived files even. This can cause major headaches when editing local variables and components don’t seem to respond to the edits.


I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.

accepted.name: Jon Armstrong
accepted.description: a11y, design systems and automation

plugins.tagline: Replace those pesky remote variables!

plugins.name: another-data-populator
plugins.description:
Another Data Populator


A Figma plugin that populates your designs with JSON.


How it works


1. Create a Layer Group that contains at least one Text Layer. In the Text Layer content, use placeholders for you data fields in double curly brackets – such as {{firstname}} or {{lastname}}. The plugin will replace all these placeholders with respective data. _Please note that if your Text Layer is called {{name}} (in the Layer List), the content of the Layer will always be overwritten with the data contained in {{name}}. So if you use multiple {{placeholders}} in a Text Layer, you should rename your Layer to something without curly brackets._


2. In the same Layer Group, create a Shape Layer (this is your image placeholder). Give the Shape Layer a placeholder name in double curly brackets – such as {{image}}. The plugin will replace this placeholder with respective image data (PNG or JPG).


3. For JSON arrays, create a Layer Group with a placeholder name like {{items}}. That group must contain one child Group Layer with the name {{template}}. This is the group that will be cloned and populated with the JSON array data. This works recursively with nested data. The array placeholder can have an optional limit filter {{items | limit 5}}, which will limit the number of {{template}} clones.


Available Commands


Populate with Dummy JSON

The plugin includes presets from https://dummyjson.com/ including:


- Products

- Carts

- Recipes

- Users

- Posts

- Comments

- Todos

- Quotes


Populate with Imported JSON

You can also upload any JSON file from your machine.


Filters

By appending your {{placeholder}} with one of the following available filters, separated by a |, you can use certain operations on your populated strings.


1. Maximum characters

You can set the maximum number of characters of your {{placeholder}} by appending it with | max n, 'n' representing the desired number of characters.


{{name | max 3}}


2. Date

Display {{placeholder}} in MM/DD/YYYY format.


{{dateTimeString | date}}


Conditional Actions

A Conditional Action performs a certain action on a Layer Group or Component based on data and a conditional expression. The Conditional Action is controlled by the name of the Layer Group (or Component).


1. #show[condition]

shows layer if true and hides otherwise


2. #hide[condition]

hides layer if true and shows otherwise


2. #duplicate[condition]

duplicate layer n times


3. #variant[condition, component property]

set component property based on condition


Examples

#show[{{firstname}}.length > 3]

shows layer if {{firstname}} has more than 3 characters and hides otherwise


#show[{{firstname}} == "Peter"]

shows layer if {{firstname}} is 'Peter' and hides otherwise


#duplicate[{{rating}}]

duplicates the layer by the value of {{rating}}


#variant[{{completed}}, Value Type = Checked]

sets the component property "Value Type" to "Checked" if {{completed}} is true


You can combine several conditions:


#show[{{firstname}}.includes('e') || {{firstname}}.length > 3]

shows layer if {{firstname}} includes 'e' or has more than 3 characters, hides otherwise


Or several Conditional Actions:


#variant[{{completed}}, Value Type = Checked] #variant[{{completed}}, State = Completed]

sets the component properties "Value Type" to "Checked" and "State" to "Completed" if {{completed}} is true


Pure JavaScript syntax is being used for Conditional Actions, so you can basically use anything available in JavaScript.
plugins.tagline: Populate your designs with JSON

135283.name: another-data-populator

How it works


1. Create a Layer Group that contains at least one Text Layer. In the Text Layer content, use placeholders for you data fields in double curly brackets – such as {{firstname}} or {{lastname}}. The plugin will replace all these placeholders with respective data. _Please note that if your Text Layer is called {{name}} (in the Layer List), the content of the Layer will always be overwritten with the data contained in {{name}}. So if you use multiple {{placeholders}} in a Text Layer, you should rename your Layer to something without curly brackets._


2. In the same Layer Group, create a Shape Layer (this is your image placeholder). Give the Shape Layer a placeholder name in double curly brackets – such as {{image}}. The plugin will replace this placeholder with respective image data (PNG or JPG).


3. For JSON arrays, create a Layer Group with a placeholder name like {{items}}. That group must contain one child Group Layer with the name {{template}}. This is the group that will be cloned and populated with the JSON array data. This works recursively with nested data. The array placeholder can have an optional limit filter {{items | limit 5}}, which will limit the number of {{template}} clones.


Available Commands


Populate with Dummy JSON

The plugin includes presets from https://dummyjson.com/ including:


- Products

- Carts

- Recipes

- Users

- Posts

- Comments

- Todos

- Quotes


Populate with Imported JSON

You can also upload any JSON file from your machine.


Filters

By appending your {{placeholder}} with one of the following available filters, separated by a |, you can use certain operations on your populated strings.


1. Maximum characters

You can set the maximum number of characters of your {{placeholder}} by appending it with | max n, 'n' representing the desired number of characters.


{{name | max 3}}


2. Date

Display {{placeholder}} in MM/DD/YYYY format.


{{dateTimeString | date}}


Conditional Actions

A Conditional Action performs a certain action on a Layer Group or Component based on data and a conditional expression. The Conditional Action is controlled by the name of the Layer Group (or Component).


1. #show[condition]

shows layer if true and hides otherwise


2. #hide[condition]

hides layer if true and shows otherwise


2. #duplicate[condition]

duplicate layer n times


3. #variant[condition, component property]

set component property based on condition


Examples

#show[{{firstname}}.length > 3]

shows layer if {{firstname}} has more than 3 characters and hides otherwise


#show[{{firstname}} == "Peter"]

shows layer if {{firstname}} is 'Peter' and hides otherwise


#duplicate[{{rating}}]

duplicates the layer by the value of {{rating}}


#variant[{{completed}}, Value Type = Checked]

sets the component property "Value Type" to "Checked" if {{completed}} is true


You can combine several conditions:


#show[{{firstname}}.includes('e') || {{firstname}}.length > 3]

shows layer if {{firstname}} includes 'e' or has more than 3 characters, hides otherwise


Or several Conditional Actions:


#variant[{{completed}}, Value Type = Checked] #variant[{{completed}}, State = Completed]

sets the component properties "Value Type" to "Checked" and "State" to "Completed" if {{completed}} is true


Pure JavaScript syntax is being used for Conditional Actions, so you can basically use anything available in JavaScript.

plugins.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター
plugins.description:
# Image Aspect Ratio & Background Blur Generator Plugin


## Overview


This Figma plugin automatically generates a new frame from selected images (or rectangles with image fills),

with a **specified aspect ratio and width, and a blurred background**.


- Useful for creating SNS thumbnails and other aspect-ratio-fixed images

- Supports batch processing of multiple images at once


---


## Main Features


- **Aspect Ratio & Width Customization**

Choose from custom ratios or presets (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, etc.). You can freely specify the width (px).


- **Background Blur Effect**

The original image is enlarged and blurred as the background, with the original image centered. Blur strength and scale are adjustable.


- **Batch Processing**

Select multiple images or rectangles with image fills and generate all at once.


- **Automatic Saving & Restoration of Settings**

Your last-used settings are saved in Figma's clientStorage and automatically restored on next launch.


- **Japanese UI**

Intuitive and easy-to-use Japanese interface.


---


## How to Use


1. **Select images or rectangles with image fills**

Multiple selection is supported.


2. **Launch the plugin**

Set the aspect ratio, width, blur strength, and scale in the UI.


3. **Click the "Create" button**

A new frame with the specified ratio, width, and blurred background will be generated to the right of the selected image(s).


4. **Notification**

Success and error messages are shown at the bottom of the UI with color distinction.


---


## Notes


- Non-image nodes are automatically skipped.

- Settings are saved per Figma file.


---


## Data Security


- This plugin does **not** send any user data, images, or personal information to external servers.

- All settings are stored locally using Figma's `clientStorage` API.

- No external API or server communication is performed.


---


# 背景ブラー＆アスペクト比固定の画像生成プラグイン


## 概要


この Figma プラグインは、選択した画像（または画像 fill を持つ矩形）から、

**指定したアスペクト比・幅で新しいフレームを作成し、背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成**します。


- SNS 用サムネイルやサムネイル画像の自動生成に便利です

- 複数画像を一括で処理できます


---


## 主な機能


- **アスペクト比・幅の指定**

カスタム比率やプリセット（16:9, 4:3, 1:1 など）から選択可能。幅（px）も自由に指定できます。


- **背景ブラー効果**

元画像を拡大・ぼかして背景にし、中央に元画像を配置します。ブラー強度や拡大率も調整可能。


- **複数画像の一括処理**

複数の画像や画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択して一括で生成できます。


- **前回の設定値を自動保存・復元**

設定値は Figma の clientStorage に保存され、次回起動時に自動で復元されます。


- **日本語 UI**

直感的で使いやすい日本語インターフェース。


---


## 使い方


1. **画像または画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択**

複数選択も可能です。


2. **プラグインを起動**

UI でアスペクト比・幅・ブラー強度・拡大率を設定します。


3. **「作成」ボタンをクリック**

選択画像の右隣に、指定した比率・幅・ブラー背景付きの新しいフレームが自動生成されます。


4. **通知**

成功・エラーは画面下部に色分けして表示されます。


---


## 注意点


- 画像以外のノードは自動的にスキップされます。

- 設定値は Figma ファイルごとに保存されます。


---


## データセキュリティ


- 本プラグインはユーザーのデータや画像、個人情報を外部サーバーに一切送信しません。

- 設定値はFigmaの`clientStorage`機能を用いてローカル環境のみに保存されます。

- 外部APIや外部サーバーとの通信は一切行いません。
plugins.tagline: 選択した画像から、指定したアスペクト比・幅で背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成します。

plugins.name: ComponentFiller AI
plugins.description:
ComponentFiller は生成AIを用いて、選択したフレームの原稿と、人間が用意したコンポーネントのコードを組み合わせ、コンポーネントに適切な原稿を入力したコードを返します（要APIキー／Gemini のAPIは無料で取得できます）


利用方法

  1. 利用するAIのAPIを選択
  2. APIキーを入力
  3. 利用する言語と、言語に合わせた基本のプロンプトを設定（任意）
  4. ベースとなるコンポーネントのコードを入力
  5. 利用したいフレームを選択
  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---


ComponentFiller uses generation AI to combine the script for the selected frame with the component code prepared by humans, and returns a code with the appropriate script entered into the component (API key required).


How to use

  1. Select the AI ​​API to use
  2. Enter the API key
  3. Set the language to use and the basic prompt for the language (optional)
  4. Enter the base component code
  5. Select the frame you want to use
  6. Generate code


Please note: Your data will be sent to the AI ​​service of your choice to generate the code.
plugins.tagline: Insert the text from the design data into your code

plugins.name: Syntax Highlighter
plugins.description:
How to use


Applying syntax highlighting colors


  1. Select a text layer containing a code snippet.
  2. Choose a programming language, if required (the plugin will try to identify the language automatically).
  3. Choose a theme.
  4. Toggle include background and line numbers, if required.
  5. Click Apply.


Clearing syntax highlighting colors


  1. Select a text layer containing a formatted code snippet.
  2. Click the Clear formatting button.


Adding custom Visual Studio themes


  1. Open Visual Studio Code.
  2. Install the desired color theme and switch to the theme in Visual Studio Code.
  3. Press Ctrl + Shift + P and run Developer: Generate Color Theme from current settings.
  4. Select the file's contents and copy.
  5. Open the Figma plugin and press the Create a new theme button.
  6. Paste into the Create a new theme dialog and click Save.


Note: This plugin supports up to 10 custom themes.

accepted.description: The official account for Microsoft Design.

accepted.name: Lee Murray
accepted.description: Senior UX Engineer @ Microsoft

plugins.name: Sustainalyzer
plugins.description:
Sustainalyzer helps you evaluate the ecological impact of your Figma designs. It detects design elements that conflict with the Web Sustainability Guidelines (WSG) and scientific research on digital sustainability.


The plugin checks for the following sustainability issues:


  1. Avoid videos, particularly autoplay or background media
  2. Minimize image use, especially large or excessive images
  3. Optimize images for size, format, and scaling
  4. Avoid third-party services (e.g. embeds, maps, social widgets)
  5. Avoid decorative elements that add visual weight without purpose
  6. Limit font variants to reduce font file size
  7. Prefer system fonts over custom fonts
  8. Reduce complexity by limiting the number of elements
  9. Disable animation autoplay to reduce processor load
  10. Consider older devices, avoiding effects that degrade performance or compatibility
  11. Use a design system to support reuse and reduce redundancy
  12. Choose energy-efficient colors, especially for large UI areas


Each guideline is tagged with an impact level—high, medium, or low—indicating its potential contribution to emissions. You can filter the results by impact level to focus on the most critical issues.


To use Sustainalyzer, simply select the elements you want to analyze and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: Check your designs for sustainability issues based on the Web Sustainability Guidelines.

plugins.name: prompt2canvas
plugins.description:
prompt2canvas brings powerful AI image generation directly into Figma. Use top models like Flux, SDXL, Imagen, and more—without leaving your design canvas.


Easily customize each model’s settings through a clean and intuitive interface, tailor prompts to your needs, and generate stunning visuals in seconds.


To use the plugin, you’ll need an API key from Replicate, which gives you access to a wide range of state-of-the-art AI models.
plugins.tagline: The power of top AI models, seamlessly integrated into your design workflow.
